name: Bakers delight game: coffee , strawberry marshmallow & chocolate cookies FREE
name_original: Bakers delight game: coffee , strawberry marshmallow & chocolate cookies FREE
description:
Bakers Delight is a match three game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. It is a nonstop blitz of cute pastry icons!

The angry mr.cupcake felt like the least popular pastry in the bakery. He wanted more attention, so he helped gingerbread man, cookie, cream puff and chocolate cake escape

Now Mr. Baker is chasing down pastries scattered all across the city!

The game is simple. Help the keeper line up three or more identical pastry icons vertically or horizontally. Earn tons of tokens along the way and use them to buy fun Powerups.

Game Features:

**DIG THE ULTRA-COOL DESIGN**
Check out the sweet graphics and groove to original songs and sound effects as you bust a move, DX style.

**TRY 3 MODES OF GAMEPLAY**
Levels – Test your skills and become the best.
Timed – Match as many pastries as you can as the clock winds down.
Endless – Swipe, dash, and crush to your heart's content and earn tons of tokens.

**EARN COOL POWERUPS**.

**CHOOSE A BACKGROUND**
pick from 5 backgrounds

**MAKE THE PASTRIES LAUGH**
Match four pastries to make one laugh. Match two more tiles with the laughing one, and watch all the adjacent tiles pop!

**PROVE YOUR BAKING SKILLS**
Play to beat your high score, earn tokens, and redeem them for helpful Powerups on your way to match3 mastery.
